alert.note: Alert for Ashley (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 6:22PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Ashley County in southeastern Arkansas and western Morehouse Parishes through 715 PM CDT... At 622 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jones, or 11 miles southwest of Wilmot, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Galion around 645 PM CDT. Beekman around 655 PM CDT. Bastrop around 715 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Collinston, Mer Rouge and Bonita. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
